description: Purple Milkweed (Asclepias purpurascens) is an amazing perennial plant species with light purple flowers and beautiful silvery foliage. It is an amazing choice for the garden, and its flowers greatly attract pollinators such as hummingbirds, butterflies and bees. Its foliage is both attractive and useful, as its milky sap is known to be a remedy for a number of skin ailments. This hardy species is easy to grow and makes an attractive addition to flower beds while also providing food and shelter to wildlife. Plus, it's drought-tolerant and doesn't require much water or maintenance. With its beauty, usefulness, and resilience, it's no wonder Purple Milkweed is a much-loved plant.
